alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 26 at 2:20PM MST until January 28 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Northern Rosebud and Powder River. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads, including US-212, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall is expected late Friday into Friday night.
info.instruction: People should consider delaying travel. If travel is absolutely necessary, drive with extreme caution. Consider taking a winter storm kit along with you, including such items as tire chains, booster cables, flashlight, shovel, blankets and extra clothing. Also take water, a first aid kit, and anything else that would help you survive in case you become stranded.
